title: Pina Coladas
report: It has been my experience, that after you use your favorite extraction method, if you freeze the liquid in ice trays you can then make frozen drinks. My wife and I like to make pina coladas. This makes it easy to drink with no nausea. You may experience one small problem; brain freeze.

erowid.citation: Sillycybin60. "Pina Coladas: experience with Cacti - T. pachanoi (San Pedro) (ID 79564)". Erowid.org. Jun 24, 2009. erowid.org/exp/79564
